title: Return Policy
description: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase for all gadgets and phones, provided the item is in its original condition and packaging. A valid receipt is required.

title: Warranty Policy
description: All gadgets and phones come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty covering hardware defects. Extended warranties are available for purchase.

title: Shipping Policy
description: We offer free standard shipping on all orders above $500. Expedited shipping is available at an additional cost. Orders are processed within 1-2 business days.

title: Customer Support
description: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues or inquiries. You can contact us via email, phone, or live chat.

title: Privacy Policy
description: Your data is important to us. We adhere to strict privacy practices to ensure your personal information is safe. We do not share your data with third parties.
